TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridTemplateColumn extends System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: Represents a column that hosts template-specified content in its cells.

span.span: Represents a column that hosts template-specified content in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型可让你通过指定显示和编辑值时要使用的单元格模板创建你自己的列类型。The type enables you to create your own column types by specifying the cell templates to use when displaying and editing values. 若要指定用于显示在编辑模式下不是单元格的内容的模板，设置属性。To specify the template that is used to display the contents of a cell that is not in editing mode, set the property. 若要指定用于显示的单元格处于编辑模式的内容的模板，设置属性。To specify the template that is used to display the contents of a cell that is in editing mode, set the property. 有关模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)和[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information about templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md) and [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 为方便起见，提供了以下预定义的列类型：For convenience, provides the following pre-defined column types: |列名称Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示 URI 数据。Use to display URI data.| ||用于显示枚举数据。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用于显示文本。Use to display text.| ||用于显示布尔数据。Use to display Boolean data.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 。The following example shows how to create a . [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TemplateColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_templatecolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 下图显示了从上面的 XAML 的输出。The following illustration shows the output from the previous XAML. ![使用 DataTemplate 的列](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "使用 DataTemplate 的列")![A column using a DataTemplate](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "A column using a DataTemplate")

summary.span: Gets or sets the template to use to display the contents of a cell that is in editing mode.

span.span: The template that is used to display the contents of a cell that is in editing mode.
The registered default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑模板的单元格定义如何将内容显示在列单元格处于编辑模式时。The cell editing template defines how the content is displayed in the column cells when in editing mode. 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)和[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md) and [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 若要定义的单元格处于编辑模式模板，请使用。To define the template for the cell that is not in editing mode, use the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建用于显示和编辑的日期列。The following example shows how to create the for displaying and editing a column of dates. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TemplateColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_templatecolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 下图显示了从上面的 XAML 的输出。The following illustration shows the output from the previous XAML. ![使用 DataTemplate 的列](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "使用 DataTemplate 的列")![A column using a DataTemplate](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "A column using a DataTemplate")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格模板定义的内容在列单元格中的显示方式。The cell template defines how the content is displayed in the column cells. 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)和[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md) and [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 若要定义的单元格处于编辑模式模板，请使用。To define the template for a cell that is in editing mode, use the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建用于显示日期的列。The following example shows how to create the for displaying a column of dates. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_TemplateColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_templatecolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 下图显示了从上面的 XAML 的输出。The following illustration shows the output from the previous XAML. ![使用 DataTemplate 的列](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "使用 DataTemplate 的列")![A column using a DataTemplate](~/add/media/ndp-wpf-templatecolumn.png "A column using a DataTemplate")
